name: All-in-Gun
description:
All-in-Gun

In All-in-Gun, you use the spacebar (or mouse) to move, attack and select, all by shooting your gun. The main mode has 30 levels, before you'll get a rating from 1 to 7 based on the time it took for you to complete the game.

Multiplayer

You can also play this game with a friend! Every player can take 2 hits before they die. The first person to score 3 points wins!

Controls

You shoot using the spacebar or the left mouse button. This game is also compatible with touchscreen devices!

To change the graphics quality, press 1 or 2 on your keyboard. 

I would appreciate any feedback or suggestions!  Have fun!
